content: A new cache issue. This time I updated a lake with mathlib project on windows. The cache was successfully executed. Nevertheless a large part of Std, Qq, and Mathlib is getting built again. I only opened vscode after cache finished its job.

EDIT: ~~I suspect the extension is looking for the cache somewhere other than ~/.cache. Perhaps locally?~~
It was a lean-toolchain issue. For the last few updates I have not had to change my lean-toolchain manually to match mathlib.
Shreyas Srinivas has marked this topic as resolved.
